title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeTitle: The Hunter Is Now The Hunted
tv.episodeOverview: Rinku sets a plan in motion with Arjan Singh and executes immaculately. Samarth pulls in all his resources and announces a face-off with the mighty Atwals.
